body_html:
Thank you very much for contributing this! We are moving to having a working bazel implementation for Windows that will be supported. For now, the CMake version is the best option that we support on a best effort basis.

I'm going to close this issue for administrative purposes, but it is much appreciated.

@MarkDaoust is there something we could use from there?
CC @guschmue @mrry

body:
Thank you very much for contributing this! We are moving to having a working bazel implementation for Windows that will be supported. For now, the CMake version is the best option that we support on a best effort basis.

I'm going to close this issue for administrative purposes, but it is much appreciated.

@MarkDaoust is there something we could use from there?
CC @guschmue @mrry
